channel.title: I really really need help, its hard to run moparscape
channel.description: ok i have the client downloaded and everything(java is updated) and everytime i try to log into server: 127.0.0.1 or say... rs2.servegame.org it will let me sign in for likke 5 seconds and will always lose connection and log me out, then when i try to log back in, it says "server may be down click 'cancel' and 'start server, and it wont let me log back in again unless i close it and re-open it but it still keep losing connection can someone plz!! someone help me with my problem

item.title: I really really need help, its hard to run moparscape
item.dc:creator: @bloodomen bloodomen
item.description:
@bloodomen wrote:

m4g3owns that was so uncalled for, how rude can u get? isnt that against forums rules? iam a straight A speller and reader through out school, so please dont misjudge me. and how do u misspell 127.0.0.1 its the server u start with when it loads!! and i said i can log in so i spelt it right, all it does is lose connection every 5 seconds, so i think ur the person who cant read cuz u didnt read wat i typed

Read full topic

item.title: I really really need help, its hard to run moparscape
item.dc:creator: @You_Know_Java You Know Java?
item.description:
@You_Know_Java wrote:

That’s either because of the port is down, or you’re typing in the wrong server name/spelling mistake…Or…It could just be the server updating.

item.description:
@bloodomen wrote:

so is there a way to fix my problem
cuz i would love to play it, everyone says its great[br][size=1]Posted at: December 15, 2006, 04:19:13 AM[/size][hr]i dont know if this is my problem or not but when i try to use the moparscape webclient, it stays gray and says error no applebot found… how do i get that??
